purpose: Facilitates the creation and deployment of AI-driven workflows in TypeScript environments.
principle: Builds on Vercel AI SDK, leveraging serverless functions for scalable AI workflow execution.
reusability: Designed for easy integration into TypeScript projects, supporting modular and reusable workflow components.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may lack comprehensive documentation and stability for production use.
name: flows-ai
description: Run AI workflows with TypeScript & Vercel AI SDK
highlight: Seamlessly integrates AI workflows with TypeScript using Vercel AI SDK for efficient development.
